name: Gloom: Surrounded
description:
A city has been corrupted by an insidious plague.

Purge them in fire.

========================================================

Doom-style shooter, with some randomized level layout optional platforming and no hand-holding.

========================================================

WASD or ZQSD for movement, including wall run

Spacebar to jump or wall-jump

R to reload, mouse-click to kill

Esc to pause and change mouse sensitivity

========================================================

Gotta purge'em all ! -- Don't be afraid to run away though.

Optional goal : visit all lamp posts.

========================================================

NOTE

This being a game jam entry, I overscoped and had to cut a few corners, partly because of a bug that stopped the enemies from moving (btw , this still happens  around one building ; they despawn after a while). So the map is not as fleshed out and parkour-ish as envisioned.

In a perfect world, I'd fix the bug and completely overhaul the city layout. 

========================================================

made with Godot.

None of the art is mine (except buildings and screenshots)

========================================================
